nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
Light blue ice block melting into a colorless water puddle
Off-white raw egg cooking in a pan, turning yolk and white solid
Correctly shows reversible change: Ice melting into water
Correctly shows irreversible change: Egg cooking in a pan
Missing illustration of water freezing back to ice
Add the freezing process back to ice to complete the reversible cycle
Missing labels like 'solid' and 'liquid' for phases
Include labels for 'solid' and 'liquid' phases in drawings
